article_html: Fans are divided over Floyd Mayweather's victory against Manny Pacquiao. Mayweather's win in the most lucrative fight in history adds the WBO welterweight belt to the WBC and WBA titles he already owns after he beat his rival in a unanimous decision in Las Vegas at the MGM Grand Garden Arena on Saturday (2 May). Pacquiao blames a shoulder injury for his defeat which he claims had stopped him from using his right hand. Video courtesy of Mayweather-Pacquiao

title: Fight of the century: reaction as Floyd Mayweather beats Manny Pacquiao – video
